title: Title insurance policies
dataVerified: Property owner, address, policy number, title company, encumbrances
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents forged title policies. Domain binding verifies title insurance company. Permanent property ownership records. Critical for real estate transactions. Multi-page: Each policy page includes verify line - prevents page substitution attacks.
